relequen.name: Relequen
relequen.description: Shock boss of Cloudrest. Adds Overload and Shock stun mechanics. When dealt with alone, has a belanaril gryphon fighting alongside

siroria.name: Siroria
siroria.description: Fire boss of Cloudrest. Adds Fire rune stack and Standard mechanics. When dealt with alone, has a Silaeda gryphon fighting alongside

galenwe.name: Galenwe
galenwe.description: Ice boss of Cloudrest. Adds Hoarfrost and Ice Comet mechanics. When dealt with alone, has a Falarielle gryphon fighting alongside

zmaja.name: Z'maja
zmaja.description: Main boss of Cloudrest. Has a lot of mechanics: orbs which need to be focused, extended portals with 5-8 crystalls inside, undodgeable Nocturnal Favor, Creepers and Shades (on vet only). HM can be +1, +2 or +3, depending on how many bosses you skipped before. Each boss appears on arena then, and adds his mechanics to the fight.
